title: 110_s2327
content: The "Homeowners Insurance Assistance Act of 2007" is cited as the short title. It introduces a nonrefundable personal credit for certain homeowners insurance premiums under section 25E of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The "Homeowners Insurance Assistance Act of 2007" introduces a nonrefundable personal credit for eligible individuals, allowing a credit of 50% of qualified homeowners insurance premiums, not exceeding $250. The credit is reduced based on adjusted gross income and the taxpayer's state median income. The credit allowed under subsection (a) for any taxable year is limited by the regular tax liability plus the tax imposed by section 55, minus the credits allowable under this subpart and section 27. An eligible individual is defined as a taxpayer whose principal residence remains the same dwelling unit during the applicable period. An eligible individual is defined as a taxpayer whose principal residence remains the same dwelling unit during the applicable period, and is located in an area determined by the President to warrant assistance under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act due to hurricanes in 2004 or 2005, or in a county bordering the Atlantic Ocean or Gulf of Mexico. The National Association of Insurance Commissioners reported a higher increase in homeowners insurance premiums during 2004, 2005, or 2006 due to hurricane risk. The term "applicable period" refers to specific time frames based on the area's designation. The term "qualified homeowners insurance premium" refers to a percentage increase in the eligible individual's homeowners insurance premium on specific policy anniversary dates. The term "qualified homeowners insurance premium" refers to a percentage increase in the eligible individual's homeowners insurance premium on specific policy anniversary dates. The definition of "principal residence" and "homeowners insurance" is provided for this section. This section does not apply to taxable years after December 31, 2007. The table of sections for subpart A of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 of the Code is amended to include a new item after section 25D, effective after December 31, 2007. The amendments made by this section apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2006.
